element="tjsr:InternalPingForConfiguration"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="InternalPingForConfigurationResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" name="InternalPingForConfigurationResponderBinding" type="tns:InternalPingForConfigurationResponderInterface"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:healthcond:monitoring:InternalPingForConfigurationResponder:1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:healthcond:monitoring:InternalPingForConfigurationResponder:1" xmlns:core="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:healthcond:monitoring:1"> <xs:import schemaLocation="../../core_components/clinicalprocess_healthcond_monitoring_1.0.xsd" namespace="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:healthcond:monitoring:1"/> <xs:element name="InternalPingForConfiguration" type="tns:InternalPingForConfigurationType"/> <xs:element name="InternalPingForConfigurationResponse" type="tns:InternalPingForConfigurationResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="InternalPingForConfigurationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="serviceContractNamespace" type="xs:anyURI"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The namespace qualifier of the service contract to ping (which is also the namespace of the service request element). This element is primarilly of interest to a forwarding intermediary.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="logicalAddress" type="xs:anyURI"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The logical address to ping. This element is primarilly of interest to a forwarding intermediary.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="InternalPingForConfigurationResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Version of the service component that responds.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="pingDateTime" type="core:TS"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Date and time for the ping response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="configuration" type="tns:ConfigurationType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Optional list of environment information from the service component.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ConfigurationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Example of configuration information (Named by the name element): jvm/.net version, operating system version, local system time, last start/restart</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="value" type="xs:string"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" xmlns:urn1="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:healthcond:monitoring:InternalPingForConfigurationResponder:1"> <soapenv:Header> <urn:LogicalAddress>?</urn:LogicalAddress> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn1:InternalPingForConfiguration> <urn1:serviceContractNamespace>?</urn1:serviceContractNamespace> <urn1:logicalAddress>?</urn1:logicalAddress> <!--You may enter ANY elements at this point--> </urn1:InternalPingForConfiguration> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
